Stem: Erect flowering stems up to 75 cm long.
Leaves: Submerged leaves are translucent and strap-like, emergent leaves are broad, arrow-head shaped 25 cm long.
Flowers: White, with 3 petals, sometimes with purple patch in centre. About 2.5 cm wide in whorls of 3.
FruitSeeds: Clusters about 2 cm wide with 1-seeded segments. Seeds are flattened, winged and 2-3 mm long.
Habitat: Rivers, streams, marshes, garden ponds, drainage ditches, irrigation areas.
DistinguishingFeatures: Large arrow-head shaped emergent leaves distinguish from other emergent aquatic plants.
